DataElement.preferredName: Peritoneal Carcinomatosis Laparoscopy Involvement Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: total score measuring the extent of peritoneal cancer or peritoneal cancer index (PCI) related to spread of cancer within the peritoneum (the tissue that lines the abdominal wall and covers most of the organs in the abdomen) by laparoscopic examination of the abdominal cavity and its contents.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to spread of cancer within the peritoneum (the tissue that lines the abdominal wall and covers most of the organs in the abdomen) by laparoscopic examination of the abdominal cavity and its contents.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or pertaining to the peritoneum.:A condition in which cancer is spread widely throughout the body.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to the peritoneum.
Carcinoma that has spread diffusely to an anatomic site or throughout the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: (lap-a-RAHS-ko-pee) The insertion of a thin, lighted tube (called a laparoscope) through the abdominal wall to inspect the inside of the abdomen and remove tissue samples.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A surgical procedure during which a laparoscope is inserted into the abdomen to view the abdominopelvic contents for diagnostic and/or therapeutic purposes.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a total score measuring the extent of peritoneal cancer or peritoneal cancer index (PCI).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
